author: ghyls
body:
#### PR description:

- Added a test to `MPICore/test` to check the remote filter functionality.
  - The test does the following:
    1. Send some events to a remote process via MPI
    2. In the remote process, an `edm::ModuloEventIDFilter` module filters out all events whose `eventID % 3 != 0`.
    3. Non rejected events are sent back to the local process.
    4. In the local process, the `edmtest::FilteredEventValidator` module checks that only the events expected to be received are actually received.
  - The test consists on the following files:
    - `controller_filters_cfg.py` and `follower_filters_cfg.py`, the local and remote configurations respectively
    - `FilteredEventValidator.cc`, an `EDAnalyzer` to check that only the events expected to be received back are received back

Other than adding the test, this PR introduces the following changes:
- fix several inconsistent types in the metadata messages
- Removed obsolete comments
- Modified some comments to make them clearer
- Fixed various typos

#### PR validation:
- The added test passes
title: Add a simple test to check the remote filter functionality; cleanup `HeterogeneousCore/MPICore`
